title: CEB requests to have power cuts on April 18, 19, 20
body_lines: The Ceylon Electricity Board today requested the Public Utilities Commission  of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) to approve scheduled power cuts until April 20 from tomorrow.
As a result, the CEB requested a four-hour and twenty-minute power outage on Monday (18), as well as four-hour and fifty-minute outages on Tuesday (19) and Wednesday (20).
The power cut will be imposed from 8 a.m. until 10.30 p.m on two occasions.
As a result, a three-hour and twenty-minute power outage during the day and a one-hour and thirty-minute power outage during the night were requested.
